description.value:
Everyone loves a good villain, and you've got no shortage of them. When a @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.WHN3T2G6R8HUKOQX]{🧿 Villainized} creature within 60ft of you is reduced to 0 hit points or killed, you can use your reaction to make another creature you can see within 60ft of you @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.WHN3T2G6R8HUKOQX]{🧿 Villainized} for 1 minute.
    If you don't take this reaction, then you do not need to have or spend any @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} points the first time you use the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.018XFM2VDH6HIHL0]{Vilify} minor action within the next minute.
